Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and into the terminal, due to a festival near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Buses will operate in both directions via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and then into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

 

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to Fiesta Boricua.

Headline: Purple Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Purple Line has been temporarily suspended due to a track switching problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Purple Line has been temporarily suspended due to a track switching problem.

Shuttle buses are available from Howard to Linden to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
